title-part.text: APPARATUS OR METHODS FOR ORAL OR DENTAL HYGIENE

reference.text: preparations for dentistry A61K6/00; preparations for cleaning the teeth or mouth A61K8/00, A61Q11/00

note.note-paragraph:
The following IPC groups are not in the CPC scheme. The subject matter for these IPC groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
A61C7/24 covered by A61C7/20
A61C7/26 covered by A61C7/20
A61C7/32 covered by A61C7/28
A61C8/02 covered by A61C8/0004
A61C11/04 covered by A61C11/00
A61C13/003 covered by A61C13/26
A61C13/007 covered by A61C13/01
A61C13/03 covered by A61C13/01
A61C13/07 covered by A61C13/0025
A61C13/093 covered by A61C13/1006
A61C13/103 covered by A61C13/1009
A61C13/105 covered by A61C13/1009
A61C13/107 covered by A61C13/0001
A61C13/113 covered by A61C13/0001
A61C13/15 covered by A61C19/003
A61C13/23 covered by A61C13/0025
A61C13/263 covered by A61C13/225
A61C13/271 covered by A61C13/26
A61C13/32 covered by A61C13/225
A61C13/36 covered by A61C13/1016
A61C13/38 covered by A61C13/12
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

CPC-specific-text.text: Ducts for supplying driving or cooling fluid, e.g. air, water
through the working tool, e.g. hollow burr
with means for preventing suction effect in turbine after deactivation of the drive air

for multiple drills, for simultaneous drilling

constricting the operating tool, e.g. chuck
Instruments or accessories for tool holders
Non-rotating tool holders, e.g. vibrating, oscillating, nutating

title-part.text: Protecting caps for hand-pieces or angle-pieces

CPC-specific-text.text: Bearings or lubricating arrangements; Drives or transmissions

reference.text: flexible shafts in general F16C; clutches in general F16D

CPC-specific-text.text: Bearings or lubricating arrangements, e.g. air-cushion bearings
with torque adjusting or limiting means
Means for allowing non driven rotation of the tool relative to the handle, e.g. toolswivel

reference.text: implanting tools A61C8/00; tools for fastening artificial teeth A61C13/12; visual inspection devices, e.g. dental mirrors, A61B1/24

title-part.text: Instruments acting like a sandblast machine
Instruments acting like a sandblast machine, e.g. for cleaning, polishing or cutting teeth

note.note-paragraph:
Group A61C3/03 is impacted by reclassification into groups A61C17/18 and A61C17/20.
Groups A61C3/03, A61C17/18 and A61C17/20 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Supports for holding tooth drills in order of use
Dentists' forceps or the like for extracting teeth

CPC-specific-text.text: Dental splints; teeth or jaw immobilisation devices; stabilizing retainers bonded to teeth after orthodontic treatments

title-part.text: Implements for surgical treatment of the roots or nerves of the teeth
Methods or instruments for medication of the roots
Means for controlling working depth, e.g. supports or boxes with depth-gauging means, stop positioners or files with adjustably-mounted handles
Means for removing broken parts of endodontic instruments
Means for preventing loss of endodontic instruments during treatment
Methods or instruments for medication of tooth nerve channels
with heating means, e.g. for heating gutta percha
Devices specially adapted for pressing or mixing capping or filling materials, e.g. amalgam presses
Mixing dental material components for immediate application to a site to be restored, e.g. a tooth cavity
Methods or devices for making crowns
Dental aids fixed to teeth during treatment, e.g. tooth clamps
Oral protectors for use during treatment, e.g. lip or mouth protectors
Orthodontics, i.e. obtaining or maintaining the desired position of teeth, e.g. by straightening, evening, regulating, separating, or by correcting malocclusions

CPC-specific-text.text: Automatic construction of a set of axes for a tooth or a plurality of teeth

title-part.text: Tools for manipulating or working with an orthodontic appliance

reference.text: tools for placement of brackets A61C7/146; instruments for attaching elastic bands A61C7/306

CPC-specific-text.text: for debonding or removing orthodontic devices

title-part.text: Extra-oral force transmitting means, i.e. means worn externally of the mouth and placing a member in the mouth under tension

CPC-specific-text.text: or positioners, e.g. for both the lower and upper arch

title-part.text: Devices having means to apply outwardly directed force, e.g. expanders

Brackets with reinforcing structure, e.g. inserts
Brackets with two or more recesses for arch wires
Positioning or placement of brackets; Tools therefor
with occlusal or gingival archwire slot opening

title-part.text: specially adapted to be cemented to teeth
specially adapted to be fixed to teeth with a band
Devices acting between upper and lower teeth
Means to be fixed to the jaw-bone for consolidating natural teeth or for fixing dental prostheses thereon

reference.text: fastening of peg-teeth in the mouth A61C13/30

CPC-specific-text.text: Impression means for implants, e.g. impression coping

reference.text: support means for endoprosthetic bone substitute or bone graft implants A61F2/2846

CPC-specific-text.text: Stimulation of growth around implant by electrical means
Consolidating prostheses or implants, e.g. by means of stabilising pins
Multiple implanting technique, i.e. multiple component implants introduced in the jaw from different directions
characterised by the material or composition, e.g. ceramics, surface layer, metal alloy
being a conversion layer, e.g. oxide layer
Juxtaosseous implants, i.e. implants lying over the outer surface of the jaw bone
Expandable implants; Implants with extendable elements
in the form of hollow cylinder with an open bottom
Connecting the upper structure to the implant, e.g. bridging bars
Connecting devices for joining an upper structure with an implant member, e.g. spacers
with angular adjustment means, e.g. ball and socket joint
having a cylindrical implant connecting part
diverging in the apical direction of the implant or abutment
with polygonal positional means, e.g. hexagonal or octagonal
with a self-locking taper, e.g. morse taper
including male and female conical parts with different angles
Implant heads specially designed for receiving an upper structure

reference.text: if separable from the implant A61C8/005

CPC-specific-text.text: with shape following the gingival surface or the bone surface
with platform switching, i.e. platform between implant and abutment
Means for sterile storage or manipulation of dental implants
for selecting the right implanting element, e.g. templates
Features of implants not otherwise provided for
Implants for use in orthodontic treatment

reference.text: computer-assisted sizing A61C13/0004; instruments for determining occlusion A61C19/05

CPC-specific-text.text: Means or methods for correctly replacing a dental model, e.g. dowel pins; Dowel pin positioning means or methods
Syringes or guns for injecting impression material; Mixing impression material for immediate use
Means or methods for taking digitized impressions
Optical means or methods, e.g. scanning the teeth by a laser or light beam
projecting one or more stripes or patterns on the teeth
Interferometric means or methods, e.g. creation of a hologram
Mechanical means or methods, e.g. a contact probe moving over the teeth

title-part.text: Dental articulators, i.e. for simulating movement of the temporo-mandibular joints
characterised by the arrangement, location or type of the hinge means

CPC-specific-text.text: with two adjustable pivoting points, e.g. Argon-type articulators
with a pivotable lower part, i.e. mandibule motion simulator
with a hinge made of resilient material

title-part.text: with means to secure dental casts to articulator

using ultrasonic or sonic machining process
Blanks or green, unfinished dental restoration parts
Repairing or adjusting dentures; Location of irritating zones
Instruments or appliances for wax-shaping or wax-removing

to be fixed to a frame

title-part.text: Devices for cleaning between the teeth

CPC-specific-text.text: comprising protuberances along its length, e.g. balls or knots
Containers, dispensers, or the like, e.g. with cutting means
with heads removable from handle, e.g. interchangeable heads

title-part.text: Devices for cleaning, polishing, rinsing or drying teeth, teeth cavities or prostheses

reference.text: instruments acting like a sandblast machine A61C3/025; tooth polishing discs or holders therefor A61C3/06; devices for cleaning between the teeth A61C15/00

note.note-paragraph: Cleaning of prostheses using ultrasonic techniques similar to those used for natural teeth is classified in this group. Other ultrasonic cleaning of prostheses is classified in group B08B3/12

title-part.text: Rinsing or air-blowing devices, e.g. using fluid jets

reference.text: combined with receptacles for spittle A61C17/14; combined with power-driven cleaning or polishing devices A61C17/16

note.note-paragraph:
Group A61C17/02 is impacted by reclassification into groups A61C17/024 and A61C17/14.
Groups A61C17/02, A61C17/024 and A61C17/14 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: specially adapted for rinsing the teeth of at least one jaw simultaneously

note.note-paragraph:
Group A61C17/0211 is impacted by reclassification into groups A61C17/0211 and A61C17/028.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: having means for manually controlling the supply of two or more fluids, e.g. water and air
, e.g. with means for heating the air

note.note-paragraph:
Group A61C17/024 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A61C17/02.
Groups A61C17/02 and A61C17/024 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A61C17/028 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A61C17/0211.
Groups A61C17/0211 and A61C17/028 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: , e.g. rinsing devices specially adapted for being connected to the main water supply
Cleaning devices for dental prostheses removed from the oral cavity
Spittoons or saliva removers for dental use

note.note-paragraph:
Group A61C17/04 is no longer used for the classification of documents as of 2019-05-01.
The content of this group is being reclassified into groups A61C17/06, A61C17/084, A61C17/088, A61C17/092, A61C17/096, A61C17/10, A61C17/12, A61C17/125, A61C17/13, A61C17/135 and A61C17/14.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Groups A61C17/06, A61C17/084, A61C17/088, A61C17/092, A61C17/096, A61C17/10, A61C17/12, A61C17/125, A61C17/13 and A61C17/135 are incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A61C17/04.
These groups should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: characterised by provisions for processing the collected matter, e.g. for separating solids or air
with tips having features to prevent suction of soft tissues

title-part.text: with mouth props, tongue guards, tongue depressors or cheek spreaders

CPC-specific-text.text: with backflow prevention, e.g. check valves

title-part.text: Dental appliances for receiving spittle, with or without rinsing means therefor, e.g. dental basins, spittoons, cuspidors

note.note-paragraph:
Group A61C17/14 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A61C17/02 and A61C17/04.
Groups A61C17/14, A61C17/02, and A61C17/04 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A61C17/18 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A61C3/03.
Groups A61C3/03 and A61C17/18 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A61C17/20 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A61C3/03.
Groups A61C3/03 and A61C17/20 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: with brushes, cushions, cups, or the like

reference.text: brush bodies, e.g. arrangements of the bristles A46B

CPC-specific-text.text: Brush body details, e.g. the shape thereof or connection to handle
Self-contained intraoral toothbrush, e.g. mouth-guard toothbrush without handle

title-part.text: driven by hydraulic motor, e.g. water motor

CPC-specific-text.text: characterized by the movement of the brush body
Rotation around the axis of the toothbrush handle
Rotation around the axis perpendicular to the axis of toothbrush handle and in the plane defined by the bristle holder
Rotation around the axis perpendicular to the plane defined by the bristle holder
Translation along the axis of the toothbrush handle
Translation along the axis perpendicular of the axis of toothbrush handle and in the plane defined by the bristle holder
Translation along the axis perpendicular to the plane defined by the bristle holder
with combined movements of the brush body
Vibrating brush body, e.g. by using eccentric weights

title-part.text: driven by hydraulic motor, e.g. water motor

Devices for displaying or storing lost natural teeth, e.g. boxes

Measuring instruments specially adapted for dentistry

for measuring the length of the root canal of a tooth
for determining the position of a root apex
Depth measuring of periodontal pockets; Probes therefor

title-part.text: for recording mandibular movement, e.g. face bows

using colour effect, e.g. for identification purposes

using chip tag or any electronic identification mean, e.g. RFID
